name: yearinconstitutionmaking
varlab: Year in constitution making process (10 pre- & 10 post-)

name: pluralapproval_ordinal
varlab: Number of forces that approved constitution (1, 2, 3+)

name: citizenconsultation_ordinal
varlab: Number of instances of citizen consultation in const making

name: citizenvoting_ordinal
varlab: Number of instances of citizen voting in const making (referendums)

name: df_legconstraints
varlab: Legislative constraints on the executive index (V-Dem)

name: df_juconstraints
varlab: Judicial constraints on the executive index (V-Dem)

name: pluralcompetition
varlab: 100 minus % of vote of largest party (Vanhanen)

name: decadeofadoption
varlab: Decade in which constitution was adopted

name: placeboyearinconstmaking
varlab: Placebo year in constitution making process

name: quinquennium1
varlab: Years -10 to -6 in 20 year window around const making (10 pre, 10 post)

name: quinquennium3
varlab: Years +1 to +5 in 20 year window around const making (10 pre, 10 post)

name: quinquennium4
varlab: Years +6 to +10 in 20 year window around const making (10 pre, 10 post)
